description: React component for a demo SMS card that sends SMS via Twilio API, including configuration retrieval, input validation, and API call handling.

methods.name: getTwilioConfig
methods.description: Retrieves Twilio configuration from environment variables.

methods.name: isLikelyE164
methods.description: Validates if a phone number string matches E.164 format.

methods.name: parseTwilioError
methods.description: Parses error response from Twilio API to extract error message.
